name: The Colosseum
description:
The Colosseum tells the story of Lux, a young man who has traveled to Roma in search of his father, Ignis - Champion of The Colosseum. Lux's journey soon repeats his father's, as his path leads to him becoming a gladiator and fighting for his life in pursuit of his goal. 

This game is a visual novel, with elements of turn based combat.
